body.p:
Mt. Sterling Ky Jan 2. 1861
Hon. B, Magoffin
Dr. Governor

Inclosed I send you a petition for John Phelps to remit a fine against him, for wearing concealed weapons, It is signed by the Jury who tried the case. It correctly recites the facts as developed by the proof. I hope you will remit it forthwith as the Sheriff is pressing Mr. Phelps for the Money on the fine

Very Resp Yr Friend
T. Turner
